00389 inline uint32  
00390 OldBoundrySegment::getNbrConnectionsToNode(byte i) const 
00391 {
00392    if (i == 0)
00393       return (m_connectionsToNode0.size());
00394    else 
00395       return (m_connectionsToNode1.size());
00396 }
00397 
00398 inline OldConnection* 
00399 OldBoundrySegment::getConnectToNode(byte n, uint32 i) const
00400 {
00401    MC2_ASSERT( (n == 0) || (n == 1));
00402    if (n == 0) {
00403       return (m_connectionsToNode0[i].second);
00404    } else {
00405       return (m_connectionsToNode1[i].second);
00406    }
00407 }
00408 
00409 inline uint32 
00410 OldBoundrySegment::getFromMapIDToNode(byte n, uint32 i) const
00411 {
00412    MC2_ASSERT( (n == 0) || (n == 1));
00413    if (n == 0) {
00414       return (m_connectionsToNode0[i].first);
00415    } else {
00416       return (m_connectionsToNode1[i].first);
00417    }
00418 }

00467 inline OldBoundrySegment*
00468 OldBoundrySegmentsVector::getBoundrySegment(uint32 itemID) const
00469 {
00470    OldBoundrySegment searchEC(itemID & ITEMID_MASK, OldBoundrySegment::noNodeClose);
00471    return ( static_cast<OldBoundrySegment*>(binaryGet(&searchEC)));
